name: Dragon Duel
description:
Clear each castle by destroying the enemy dragons and monsters. Watch out! You have to avoid spiked balls and lava pits. Unlock secret passages and earn points by collecting magical treasures. A classic retro favorite, in new glorious 3D! T his incredible new action-packed game has awesome music and graphics.

Features

* 20 amazing levels
* Power-ups
* High-score table
* Super addicting game-play
* Cool musical soundtrack
* Fire-breathing dragons!
